name: Of Flesh and Teeth
description:
*Wear Some Headphones*

After crashing their truck, a nameless wanderer will stop at nothing to find their missing dog. Travel into the forest, find your dog, and fight off the monsters that lurk within. Play the demo and experience the terror of flesh and teeth.

Featuring:

  • Awesome doggie
  • Neat graphics
  • Action and horror in one sitting
  • Spooky sounds

If you enjoyed this game then why not give me a follow on Twitter @GrapePaste? I post at least once a week about my game, 'When Ash Turns to Snow', as well as other games like this one!

This game was made for Game Dev Unlocked's second game jam. The theme being 'Lost & Found. It's just a demo... well... more of a prototype that I might continue in the future. If I do continue to work on it, then it'll probably be reworked into a PSX-style game since the current 'good graphics' build doesn't quite mesh well with Itch.io's 1GB limit (and I'm not gonna spend a hundred bucks to put this on Steam lol). Anyway, follow me on Twitter for more updates on this as well as my other game that I'm currently working on!

(If you're making a video about this game then please note that all sound and music used in this game are public domain)

↓↓ If you encounter any bugs then let me know in the comments below ↓↓

Known Bugs:

  • Ambient music stops playing when inside the house.
  • Pistol ammo on the couch can't be picked up.
  • Red light shines through the wall onto the kitchen cabinet.
  • Some ragdolls have spazzy parts.

Hope you liked it, thanks for playing!
